description: Simple Tool Reference Catalog for Claude

read_file.description: Read the complete contents of a file.

write_file.description: Create a new file or completely overwrite an existing file with new content.

edit_file.description: Edit a file by replacing a specific text segment with new text.

enhanced_edit_file.description: Edit a file by replacing a specific text segment with new text (enhanced version).

search_files.description: Recursively search for files and directories matching a pattern.

move_file.description: Move or rename a file or directory.

directory_tree.description: Get a recursive tree view of files and directories as a JSON structure.

create_directory.description: Create a new directory or ensure a directory exists.

get_file_info.description: Retrieve detailed metadata about a file or directory.

read_multiple_files.description: Read the contents of multiple files simultaneously.

initialize_librarian.description: Initialize the AI Librarian for a project.

query_component.description: Query information about a specific component in the project.

find_implementation.description: Find implementations containing the specified search text.

generate_librarian.description: Generate or update the AI Librarian for a project.

find_related_files.description: Find files that are related to a specific file in the project.

add_todo.description: Add a new to-do item to the project's persistent to-do list.

list_todos.description: List to-do items for the project with optional filtering.

update_todo_status.description: Update the status of a to-do item.

add_subtask.description: Add a subtask to an existing to-do item.

search_todos.description: Search for to-do items by text in title or description.

infer_todos.description: Analyze text and extract potential to-do items, adding them to the list.

list_allowed_directories.description: Returns the list of directories that this server is allowed to access.

check_project_access.description:
Check if the server has permission to access a specific project directory.
This is required before initializing the AI Librarian for a project.

create_edit_bookmark.description: Create a bookmark for editing a section of a file.

get_bookmark_content.description: Get the content of an edit bookmark.

update_bookmark.description: Update the content of an edit bookmark.

apply_bookmark.description: Apply a bookmark to the original file.

list_bookmarks.description: List all active bookmarks for a project.
